body_html:
@tfboyd I am wondering if there is a way to do this without using the estimator api. Since in estimator api there is no flexibility and one cannot use it for deep research projects.

Based on the complaint I have seen about tensorflow, i guess people in the community do not have any voice and tensorflow does what it does regardless of the needs of the community.

body:
@tfboyd  I am wondering if there is a way to do this without using the estimator api. Since in estimator api there is no flexibility and one cannot use it for deep research projects.

Based on the complaint I have seen about tensorflow, i guess people in the community do not have any voice and tensorflow does what it does regardless of the needs of the community.
